thread.title: Stringing together a tune

author: Todd Nighswonger
title: Stringing together a tune
text: Stringing together a tune One of the more frequently seen music groups around the Neosho area is the Hairy Vetch String Band (aka Jack and Lee Ann Sours and Co.) that plays at the Neosho Farmers Market, like it did Saturday, the Neosho Fall Festival last weekend and many other events and venues. The six-piece band plays catchy, old-time music. Comment   Todd Nighswonger Posted Oct. 10, 2015 at 12:01 AM Updated at 11:43 PM Posted Oct. 10, 2015 at 12:01 AM Updated at 11:43 PM One of the more frequently seen music groups around the Neosho area is the Hairy Vetch String Band (aka Jack and Lee Ann Sours and Co.) that plays at the Neosho Farmers Market, like it did Saturday, the Neosho Fall Festival last weekend and many other events and venues. The six-piece band plays catchy, old-time music. By Todd Nighswonger   Todd Nighswonger Posted Oct. 10, 2015 at 12:01 AM Updated at 11:43 PM
